text:
A malaria drug PUSHED by #Trump to treat the #coronavirus 
showed NO benefit in a large study at VA hospitals. 
The mortality rate increased.😱

This Grifter pushed a FAKE cure on behalf of donors tied
 2 the drug industry.👎
